sentences.sentence: White dinghies bob out on the petrol-blue waters.
sentences.translation: 白色的小艇在油蓝色的水域里上下浮动。

sentences.sentence: One of their dinghies was displayed in an Iranian museum as a war trophy.
sentences.translation: 英军的一艘小艇之后在一家伊朗博物馆中被当作战利品公开展示。

sentences.sentence: Sloops come in all sizes, from 8-foot dinghies to maxi boats over a hundred feet long.
sentences.translation: 单桅帆船有各种尺寸，从8英尺的小艇到一百多英尺长的超大帆船。
